mdRecord.dcterms:description: small hotel built in the site 1766; replaced by larger structure 19th century, burned 1901. Present structure by Elzner and Anderson begun 1902; tower by Warren and Wetmore added 1929. -- Loth, Virginia Landmarks Register 4th ed., U Press of Va, 1999. [work]
